record.id: field.name="operators" and file.name="cm3messages" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: operators
record.file.name: cm3messages

brief.brief: The operators who should always receive this message.
Service Manager adds the operators you specify to the list of operators indicated by the fieldname field to receive the message.

detail.detail: For example, imagine that you indicate the values assign.dept and current.pending.groups for the fieldname field and fred and betty for the operators; and you define the assign.dept field as QAG and current.pending.groups as TSG. At processing time, Service Manager would find all Members/Approvers of the Group QAG.
Assume that this list of operators is mike, emma, kelsey. Service Manager adds the operators fred and betty to this list, so you have mike, emma, Kelsey , fred and betty as the operators.
However, if the list of operators is abbey, dave and betty, then Service Manager will only add fred to the list (betty is not added because that name already appears in the list).
